name: Grimbold Ironfoot
description: Grimbold Ironfoot, a female dwarf with fiery red hair, was born into a clan of skilled miners deep within the mountains. However, her adventurous spirit led her to dabble in the ways of the ranger, honing her skills in archery and survival. As an outlander, she grew up in isolation, learning to navigate the harsh wilderness that surrounded her clan's territory. Grimbold's chaotic neutral nature shuns conformity and authority, as she finds solace and freedom in the unpredictable nature of the wild. Armed with her trusty bow and a 1-inch cube trinket with painted sides, she embarks on daring quests, seeking both wealth and excitement, never settling for a mundane life within the confines of her clan's

attributes.value: A 1-inch cube, each side painted a different color
